# Next.js Admin Panel Project - POS System

## Project Overview
Multi-role admin panel for POS system with TailwindCSS styling.

## Roles
- Admin: Full access to all features
- Manager: Access to reports, inventory, and products
- Cashier: Access to sales and basic dashboard

## Features
- Dashboard with sales overview
- Sales management
- Product catalog
- Inventory management
- Reports and analytics
- User management
- Settings

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TailwindCSS for styling
- TypeScript
- Role-based access control

## Progress
- [x] Project structure created
- [x] Next.js scaffolded
- [x] Multi-role system implemented
- [x] Admin panel layout created
- [x] POS menus implemented
- [x] Dependencies installed
